snippet: After a spate of positive numbers, some still question whether Germany will be able to avoid the recession shaping up in Europe.
abstract: Germany reports that its unemployment fell slightly during the month of December, with the average number of jobless people for the full year of 2011 at its lowest level in decades.
lead_paragraph: After a spate of positive numbers, some still question whether Germany will be able to avoid the recession shaping up in Europe.

headline.main: Jobless Rate in Germany Edges Lower, Hitting 6.8%
headline.print_headline: Jobless Rate In Germany Edges Lower, Hitting 6.8%
